alternativeNames:
Uzaki-chan ingin bermain!
Uzaki-chan Wants to Hang Out!
Uzaki-chan Wants to Play!
Узаки хочет тусоваться!
宇崎ちゃんは遊びたい!
宇崎酱想要玩耍!
우자키 양은 놀고 싶어!
author: TAKE
description: ’Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, who he has known since high school.Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "Impressively Huge".’
